(c) Ignore the stress and carry on as it is

Choices: ['"Congratulations, can we discuss something else?"', '"Great, as if I didn\'t feel bad enough already!"', '"I\'m happy for you, maybe you can give me some tips for the next one?"', '"I worked really hard too, but didn\'t get my desired score."']

This option comes across as negative and may cause the classmate to feel uncomfortable. It doesn't demonstrate a positive attitude or willingness to learn from the situation.

(c) "I'm happy for you, maybe you can give me some tips for the next one?"
This option shows that Jacob can appreciate his classmate's success and is open to learning from them. It demonstrates a growth mindset and a positive attitude.
